products.name: Scarlet
products.description:
From the popular smartphone game 'GODDESS OF VICTORY': NIKKE comes a 1/7 scale figure of Scarlet, a NIKKE from Pioneer.
Be charmed by her playful smile peeking out from under her large tsunogasa hat.
Scarlet's distinctive outfit and Fleetly Fading have been carefull sculpted, featuring detailed paintwork that is not to be missed.
Interchangeable back hair parts are also included. Her hat can also be removed, allowing for different display options.
Be sure to welcome the beautiful Scarlet into your collection
products.excerpt: From 'GODDESS OF VICTORY: NIKKE', comes a 1/7 scale figure of Scarlet, featuring a playful smile under her tsunogasa hat and a detailed outfit.

products.name: KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! 3 1/7 Scale Figure Aqua: Fairy Tale Ver.
products.description:
From the anime series 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! 3' comes a scale figure Aqua: Fairy Tale Ver.!
The figure features Aqua in an Alice in Wonderland inspired outfit,with Kazuma-themed accessories.
The lovable goddess is not to be missed in her adorable apron dress.
Be sure to add the energetic and cheerful Aqua: Fairy Tale Ver. to your collection!
products.excerpt: From the anime series 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! 3' comes a scale figure Aqua: Fairy Tale Ver.!

products.name: Mio
products.description:
From the Nintendo Switch game 'Xenoblade Chronicles 3' comes a scale figure of Mio!
The dynamic figure was based on an original illustration drawn by Masatsugu Saito, the character designer of the series.
Special care was put into the thorough sculpting of the details and texture of Mio's clothes,
and the multilayered base features the Zephyr icon, the mark of her initial class.
products.excerpt: The long-awaited scale figure of the off-seer of Agnus

products.name: Caster/Altria Caster
products.description:
From the popular smartphone game 'Fate/Grand Order' comes a scale figure of the Caster class servant Altria Caster in her Third Ascension appearance! The figure features her in a dynamic yet graceful pose, complete with elegant paintwork.
The outfit has been meticulously sculpted to reflect the delicate details and textures, with careful attention paid to the colors used, especially white and blue. The Mythological Mystic Code Marmyadose has also been faithfully recreated with detailed paintwork, allowing the figure to be enjoyed from a variety of angles.
Be sure to add the dynamic and beautiful Altria Caster to your collection!
products.excerpt: May the time of twilight come again.

products.name: Racing Miku: 2023 - 15th Anniversary Ver.
products.description: The Hatsune Miku GT Project celebrated its 15th anniversary in 2023. To celebrate, the Racing Miku 2023 illustration drawn by illustrator Toridamono for the project's 15th anniversary has been brought to life as a figure. Be sure to add the adorable Miku holding a trophy to your collection!
products.excerpt: The Hatsune Miku GT Project 15th anniversary illustration, now as a figure!

products.name: Kumano: Fancy Waves Ver.
products.description:
From the popular game 'Azur Lane' comes a 1/6th scale figure of Kumano!
The figure is based on Kumano's Fancy Waves skin, which features her in a daring swimsuit that shows off her voluptuous curves.

Kumano is sculpted with her energetic grin, revealing her distinct sharp teeth. Translucent parts have also been used for her eye-catching blonde hair to add an elegant and refreshing vibe to the figure.

Some other visual highlights include the splashing water inspired base, an adorable bear float, as well as other intricately detailed accessories.
products.excerpt: A new figure of Kumano in her swimsuit! Just kidding☆

products.name: HaneAme: 72 Sigils of Solomon - Angel Crocell
products.description:
Introducing the second collaboration between Good Smile Company and HaneAme!
HaneAme's captivating looks have been preserved in an incredible 1/6 scale figure, with detailed sculpting and paintwork not to be missed. Every step of the figure creation process was reviewed and approved by HaneAme herself, making for a faithful reproduction!
products.excerpt: 72 Sigils of Solomon - Angel Crocell, a special collaboration figure by HaneAme, CloBa and Good Smile Company!

products.name: Amiya: Newsgirl VER.
products.description:
From the popular smartphone game 'Arknights' comes a 1/7 scale figure of Amiya in her popular Newsgirl outfit. With meticulous sculpting and paintwork, the detailed textures of her outfit have been faithfully captured in scale figure form. Amiya’s oversized shoulder bag and newspapers tucked under her arm further accentuate her adorable looks.

Great care has also been taken in creating the texture and colors of the figure's base, making it appear as though taken straight from the streets of Londinium. Doctor, be sure to add the lovable Newsgirl Amiya to your collection!
products.excerpt: The sky of Londinium is always gray.

products.name: Rikka Takarada Wall Figure
products.description:
From the movie 'GRIDMAN UNIVERSE' comes a wall figure of Rikka Takarada that can be displayed by mounting on to a wall!
Lacking space to display figures? Or simply searching for a novel and aesthetically pleasing display method for figures? Introducing the wall figure, a new type of figure developed by Good Smile Company.

The wall figure was created as a space-saving solution to displaying Rikka on a swing, based on the movie teaser illustration.
The special wall shelf is designed to be hooked onto the wall by attaching the fixture with thin pins, making the installation holes less noticeable. Lightweight items can also be displayed on top of the shelf.

The figure itself has been carefully sculpted to remain faithful to Rikka's original design, with details that add to her girlish and adorable appeal.
The paintwork is clean and detailed, with the shadows on the face applied carefully. The swing has been sculpted to be adequately realistic while retaining the atmosphere of the figure.
Be sure to add Rikka to your collection! The simple design of this wall figure will allow it to blend into the interior of your home.

*The figure can also be displayed without mounting to a wall using an acrylic display stand (sold separately).
products.excerpt: A revolution! A figure you can mount on the wall! A new figure of Rikka Takarada!

products.name: Shokyu Sensei's Dance Lesson
products.description:
Popular illustrator hitomio's original character Shokyu Sensei in a dance lesson outfit is now a figure!
The figure features her in an elegant pose with her left hand grazing her hair, while her tight outfit and white stockings show off her volumptuous curves. Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Popular illustrator hitomio's original character Shokyu Sensei in a dance lesson.

products.name: Guitar MeiMei's Dance Lesson
products.description:
Popular illustrator hitomio's original character Guitar MeiMei in a dance lesson outfit is now a figure!
The figure features an alluring MeiMei lifting her hair up with both arms raised. Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Popular illustrator hitomio's original character Guitar MeiMei in a dance lesson.

products.name: Shinano: Dreams of the Hazy Moon
products.description:
From the popular game 'Azur Lane' comes a scale figure of the Sakura Empire aircraft carrier Shinano in her 'Dreams of the Hazy Moon' skin! The figure's somnolent atmosphere, like the moments after being woken up from a dream, and Shinano's slightly intoxicated expression after indulging in a glass of wine have been crafted in incredible detail.

Her bare, pink-toned skin appears supple and healthful. Translucent materials have been used to create her skirt, adorned with star and snowflake patterns. The skin of her thighs is perfectly clear, captured with careful paintwork. Even finely detailed areas, like the sculpting of her stomach, are sure to impress.

Her two tails, not fully visible in the original illustration, fill the space behind her back. Enjoy the delicate contrast between the light and dark shades throughout the figure. Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Beauteous is the moon tonight... Are you in agreement...?

products.name: Hatsune Miku: Shimian Maifu Ver.
products.description: From 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' comes a scale figure of Hatsune Miku with a traditional Chinese instrument, the pipa. The figure faithfully reproduces the elegant and dignified illustration by illustrator Rei inspired by the historical music piece 'Shimian Maifu', aimed to resemble a traditional ink painting. Hatsune Miku is posed identically to the dynamic illustration, and her flowing hair and vivid colors are sure to impress you. Be sure to add this figure of Hatsune Miku in traditional Chinese style to your collection.
products.excerpt: A song under siege, sung by a single pipa.

products.name: Takina Inoue
products.description:
From the anime series 'Lyoris Recoil' comes a 1/7 scale figure of Takina Inoue!

The figure features Takina quietly moving in tandem with Chisato and faithfully expresses her strong-willed personality.

The figure is made to be displayed with the separately sold Chisato Nishikigi scale figure, allowing you to create an original scene of the two covering each other's back.
products.excerpt: I can't save Chisato here. That's all there is to it.

products.name: Ryza (Reisalin Stout)
products.description:
From 'Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy' comes a scale figure of the protagonist Ryza, also known as Reisalin Stout, in a bold swimsuit outfit!
The figure is a faithful recreation of an illustration by character designer Toridamono featuring Ryza enjoying her time at the beach.

Ryza's glowing smile and outstretched pose holding her towel have been carefully sculpted in figure form down to every last detail.
Her wet, see-through shirt and towel featuring a figure-exclusive design have also been painted in stunning detail.

The figure rests upon a beach-themed base with a chestnut. Enjoy viewing the figure from every angle! Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Presenting a figure of Ryza enjoying the beach!.

products.name: Sun Priestess Tamayorihime
products.description:
From 'selector infected WIXOSS', the anime based on the popular trading card game 'WIXOSS' comes a full-scale figure of the level 4 LRIG, Sun Priestess Tamayorihime.

Tamayorihime's cute, innocent and playful appearance has been faithfully recreated in figure form. The floating appearance from the card along with the halos positioned around her have also been carefully preserved, creating a figure that looks as if she has jumped right out of the card to join your collection!
products.excerpt: The level 4 LRIG descending from above - Sun Priestess Tamayorihime!

products.name: figma Sakamata Chloe
products.description:
From the popular virtual YouTuber group 'Hololive Production' comes a figma of Sakamata Chloe from the 6th generation!

Face plates:
· Smiling face
· Crying face
· Dizzy face

Optional parts:
· Two types of masks
· Hooded head parts
· Arm parts without coat
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: The fixer and cleaner of Secret Society holoX is now a figma!

products.name: figma Takanashi Kiara
products.description:
From the popular virtual YouTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma of hololive English member Takanashi Kiara!

Face plates:
· Smiling face
· Closed eyes face
· Euphoric face

Optional parts:
· Sword
· Chicken
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: The phoenix of hololive's Myth is now a figma!

products.name: figma La+ Darknesss
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma of La+ Darknesss, leader of Secret Society holoX!

Face plates:
· Straight face
· Smiling face
· Frustrated face

Optional parts:
· Crow
· Cola
· Visible hand sleeve parts
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Pay close attention! La+ the leader is now a figma!

products.name: figma Gawr Gura
products.description:
From the popular virtual YouTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma of hololive English member Gawr Gura!

Face plates:
・Smiling face
・Smiling face with closed eyes
・Open-mouthed smiling face

Optional parts:
・Bloop
・Trident
・Head part without hood
・Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Same-chan, now in figma form, is on a rampage!

products.name: figma Mori Calliope
products.description:
From hololive English comes a figma of Mori Calliope!

・Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can create a variety of poses.
・A flexible plastic is used for important areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
・She comes with three face plates including a smiling face, a winking face and a funny face.
・Her scythe, a microphone, a miniature figure of Death-sensei and a pair of sunglasses are included as optional parts.
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: Excuse My Rudeness, But Could You Please RIP?

products.name: figma Houshou Marine
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma action figure of hololive 3rd Generation VTuber Houshou Marine!

・She comes with four face plates including a winking face, an aroused face, a depressed face and a wide-eyed face.
・Her jacket, hat and Dokuro-kun are all included.
・A front hair part with an eyepatch attached is included, and arm parts with articulated overly long sleeve are included as well.
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: Raise your voice, now let's set sail, we are the Houshou Pirates!

products.name: figma Shirogane Noel
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma action figure of hololive 3rd Generation fluffy, meatheaded knight VTuber Shirogane Noel!

・She comes with three face plates including a smiling face, a face with closed eyes and an angry face.
・Her mace, a beef bowl, a pair of sunglasses, a rattle and a baby bottle are included as optional parts.
・A left hand part with a ring on her ring finger is included too!
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: All hustle, all muscle! Shirogane Noel's here!

products.name: figma Shiranui Flare
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma action figure of hololive 3rd Generation half-elf VTuber Shiranui Flare!

・She comes with three face plates including a smiling face, a face with closed eyes and a winking face.
・A miniature figure of her fairy-like creature Kintsuba is included.
・Her bow and arrow from the hololive Alternative Teaser PV are included. She also comes with hand parts to pose her holding the bow and arrow.
・A left hand part with a ring on her ring finger is included too!
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: Noon-nui! This is Shiranui Flare!

products.name: figma Uruha Rushia
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma action figure of hololive 3rd Generation VTuber Uruha Rushia, the strong-yet-useless necromancer!

・She comes with three face plates including a smiling face, an angry face and a smiling face with an open mouth.
・She comes with a chick to display on her head, a kitchen knife that gives you a sense of her yandere side and a Fandead as optional parts.
・An angry effect mark that can be attached to her head by sliding it between the front hair part is included as well.
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: Hel-rushi! This is Uruha Rushia!

products.name: figma Usada Pekora
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a figma action figure of hololive 3rd Generation VTuber Usada Pekora!

・She comes with four face plates including a smiling face, a smug face, a 'Peko-gyaku' (bullying Pekora) face and a panicked face.
・She comes with her rocket launcher, a carrot and a Nousagi as optional parts.
・She also comes with an alternate front hair part with sunglasses attached as well as a drooping ear part to give her a sad look.
・An articulated figma stand is included to display the figma in a variety of poses.
products.excerpt: Konpeko! Konpeko! Konpeko! This is hololive 3rd Generation Usada Pekora-peko!

products.name: figma Kizuna AI
products.description:
The popular virtual YouTuber Kizuna AI is now a figma!

・The smooth yet posable figma joints allow you to act out a variety of different scenes.
・A flexible plastic is used in specific areas, allowing proportions to be kept without compromising posability.
・She comes with four face plates including a smiling expression, a closed-eyes smile expression, a staring expression and a shouting expression.
・Optional parts include a front hair part with attached glasses, a front hair part with attached sunglasses and a game controller!
・An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
products.excerpt: The self-proclaimed world's first virtual YouTuber has transformed into a figma!

products.name: figma Gwendolyn DX ver.
products.description:
From the popular 2D action RPG 'Odin Sphere Leifthrasir' comes a figma of one of the main characters - the Valkyrie Gwendolyn!

・Using the smooth yet posable joints of figma, you can act out a variety of different scenes.
・She comes with four face plates including a blank face, a shouting face, warm smiling face and a face with closed eyes
・Optional parts include her Psypher spear as well as her shield.
・A selection of interchangeable hand parts including one wearing the Ring Titrel.
・The DX version includes the large wings that she uses to glide through the air. They can be attached by swapping out the standard wing joints.
・An articulated figma stand is included, which allows various poses to be taken.
products.excerpt: With a single strike! Gwendolyn joins the figma series!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Merlin
products.description: POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!
products.excerpt: A New Addition to the POP UP PARADE!

products.description: POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! products.excerpt: 'Ello! Fingers! Give me your fingers!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Oozora Subaru
products.description:
POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!

From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a POP UP PARADE figure of the sports club manager Oozora Subaru! Stay tuned for more POP UP PARADE figures of hololive members coming soon! Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: 'Sup! I'm Oozora Subaru from hololive 2nd Generation!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Tokino Sora
products.description:
Aequitas adduco veniam amet. Succurro perferendis color charisma vix talis. Arguo sit dignissimos contabesco credo.
Veritas cupio inflammatio autem odio timidus autem. Cras alienus terreo arto. Suscipit vis decumbo vulnus trado tunc ager aufero.
products.excerpt: Hey, Sora-tomo! How are you all doing? It's me, Tokino Sora!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Minato Aqua
products.description:
POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!

From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a POP UP PARADE figure of hololive Second Generation virtual idol gamer maid Minato Aqua! Stay tuned for more POP UP PARADE figures of hololive members coming soon! Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Otsuaqua~

products.name: POP UP PARADE Shirakami Fubuki
products.description:
POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!

From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a POP UP PARADE figure of the white-haired animal-eared high school student, Shirakami Fubuki! Be sure to add her to your collection, and look out for more POP UP PARADE figures of hololive members coming soon!
products.excerpt: Foxy day to you! I'm Shirakami Fubuki!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Ookami Mio
products.description:
POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!

From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a POP UP PARADE figure of the black-haired animal-eared girl who just randomly appeared, Ookami Mio! Be sure to add her to your collection, and look out for more POP UP PARADE figures of hololive members coming soon!
products.excerpt: Hellooowl! It is Ookami Mio!

products.name: POP UP PARADE Hatsune Miku: YYB Type Ver.
products.description:
POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!

Presenting a POP UP PARADE figure of YYB's 3DCG model 'YYB Type Hatsune Miku'. This version of Miku features an slender, mature look. The use of translucent parts across the figure provide an extra level of detail not to be missed. Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: The very first figure of YYB's 3DCG model 'YYB Type Hatsune Miku'.

products.name: Nendoroid Sakura Miko
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of the elite shrine maiden Sakura Miko!
She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a surprised expression and an angry expression.

Optional parts include her pet shikigami Kintoki, a 35P miniature figure, a bucket of lava that fans will surely recognize and a pair of sunglasses! She also comes with an interchangeable baby body part to create her holobaby appearance! Be sure to add the elite Sakura Miko to your collection!
products.excerpt: Nya-hello! I'm the elite shrine maiden of hololive, Sakura Miko!

products.name: Nendoroid Murasaki Shion
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of hololive 2nd Generation VTuber Murasaki Shion!

Face plates:
· Smiling face
· Goading face
· Angry face

Optional parts:
· Shiokko
· 'Harvard grad' T-shirt
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Hellshio! Murasaki Shion here!

products.name: Nendoroid Omaru Polka
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of hololive 5th Generation VTuber Omaru Polka!

· Smiling face
· Wide-eyed face

Optional parts:

· Kazoo
· Zain
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Polka's here!

products.name: Nendoroid Hakui Koyori
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of Hakui Koyori, researcher of Secret Society holoX!

Face plates:
· Standard face
· Smiling face
· Scheming face

Optional parts:
· Glasses
· Mayonnaise
· Test tube
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Konkoyo~ I'm the brains of holoX, Hakui Koyori!

products.name: Nendoroid Hoshimachi Suisei
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of hololive Generation 0 VTuber Hoshimachi Suisei! She comes with three face plates including a standard face, a winking face and a psychopath face.

The Nendoroid comes with a microphone for creating poses of her singing on stage and a block as optional parts. She also comes with an axe optional part that she can be displayed holding to bring out her psychopath side! Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: It's your shooting star, your diamond in the rough, idol VTuber Hoshimachi Suisei!

products.name: Nendoroid Takane Lui
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of Takane Lui, an executive of Secret Society holoX!

· Smiling face

Optional parts:

· Sunglasses
· Other optional parts for different poses.
products.excerpt: Nendoroid Takane Lui

products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of hololive 1st Generation VTuber Aki Rosenthal!

Optional parts:

products.excerpt: Alona, everyone! This is Aki Rosenthal a.k.a. AkiRose!

products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of hololive 2nd Generation VTuber Yuzuki Choco!

・Smiling face with closed eyes

Optional parts:

・Omurice & plate

products.excerpt: Good evening, my cute students! Choc-on!

products.name: Nendoroid Natsuiro Matsuri
products.description: From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of the high school cheerleader Natsuiro Matsuri! She comes with three face plates including an energetic standard expression, a winking expression and a certain blushing expression Matsuri is known for. Optional parts include Ebifuraion, a pair of animal ears and a set of cheerleading pom poms! Enjoy using her different parts to create all kinds of scenes and situations! Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Konnichiwasshoi!

products.name: Nendoroid Yukihana Lamy
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of hololive 5th Generation VTuber Yukihana Lamy!

Face plates:

・Grinning face
・Pressuring face

Optional parts:

products.excerpt: Lamyoohoo!

products.name: Nendoroid Tsunomaki Watame
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of hololive 4th Generation VTuber Tsunomaki Watame!

Face plates:

・Pressuring face

Optional parts:

products.excerpt: Hoof, hoof, helloof! Watame did nothing wrong!

products.name: Nendoroid Akai Haato
products.description:
From the popular VTuber group 'hololive production' comes a Nendoroid of the worldwide superstar idol Akai Haato! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a smiling expression and a hopeless expression.

A Haaton miniature figure is included along with optional parts like a burnt frying pan and tarantula that she can be posed holding, allowing you to recreate 'Haachama Cooking' in Nendoroid form! She also comes with heart hand parts and pointing hand parts for creating adorable idol poses. Be sure to add her to your collection!
products.excerpt: Haachamachama~!
